===15th Century: Foundation===
The Ordo Draconum (Latin for "Order of the Dragon") was a militant order founded in 1408 by [[Sigismund von Luxembourg (Earth-616)|King Sigismund]] of [[Hungary]].{{r|Daredevil Vol 5 16}}<!-- Ordo Draconum was founded in 1408 by King Sigismund von Luxembourg of Hungary.{{r|Daredevil Vol 1 604}} --> It was originally a militant order of Catholic knights used to protect the king's territory from incursions and foreign empires.{{r|Daredevil Vol 1 604}} The order eventually included [[Vlad Dracula (Earth-616)|Vlad Dracula]], the [[Transylvania]]n son of [[Vlad Dracul (Earth-616)|Vlad Dracul]],{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe: Horror 2005 Vol 1 1|; [[Vlad Dracula (Earth-616)|Vlad Dracula]]'s entry }} appointed prince of [[Wallachia]] by Sigismund.{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe Vol 2 17|; [[Vlad Dracula (Earth-616)|Dracula]]'s entry}}

===16th to 20th Century===
After about a century, the order went underground and changed its focus to supernatural enemies. They stopped fighting for the crown, and began fighting for humanity.<!-- {{r|Daredevil Vol 1 604}} --> Their activities in the 16th century were mostly focused on the [[Vampire Wars]].<!-- {{r|Daredevil Vol 1 604}} --> In the 17th century, they opposed a [[zombies|zombie]] plague.<!-- {{r|Daredevil Vol 1 604}} --> The Order almost came to an end during the 18th century, when they battled and brought down the [[Fjord Queens]].<!-- {{r|Daredevil Vol 1 604}} --> The threat of the Vampires came back in the 19th century, and the Order fought against them again. During the 20th century, supernatural threats expanded due to military conflicts and cultures and mythologies mixing up. Among these threats the Order most notably battled [[National Socialist German Workers Party (Earth-616)|Nazi]] super-human creatures.{{r|Daredevil Vol 1 604}}<!-- unknown if during WWII or after against Nazi remnants -->

===21st Century===
The Ordo Draconum remained active when all militant orders were allegedly disbanded or disarmed.{{r|Daredevil Vol 5 16}} In modern days, the Order had chapter houses all over the world.{{r|Daredevil Vol 1 605}} Its [[New York]] watchpost was run by [[Father Jordan (Earth-616)|Father Jordan]].<!-- {{r|Daredevil Vol 1 604}} -->

When [[Hand (Earth-616)|The Hand]] launched an attack on [[Manhattan]], Father Jordan rallied twenty soldiers of the Ordo Draconum to fight the invading evil and assist [[Matthew Murdock (Earth-616)|Daredevil]].{{r|Daredevil Vol 1 604}} Despite carrying out a successful assault against the [[Beast (Demon) (Earth-616)|Beast]]'s temple, Daredevil and the Order ended up surrounded by a horde of ninja.{{r|Daredevil Vol 1 604}} Most members of the Ordo Draconum were killed, forcing Daredevil, Father Jordan and other two knights to retreat into a building. As a last-ditch attempt to escape from The Hand, Daredevil and the Order charged into a [[New York City Police Department (Earth-616)|NYPD]] stable nearby and stole horses to flee. Daredevil and the Ordo Draconum regrouped with a band of vigilantes that had been rallied by [[Franklin Nelson (Earth-616)|Foggy Nelson]] (namely [[Marc Spector (Earth-616)|Moon Knight]], [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]], [[Elektra Natchios (Earth-616)|Elektra]], and the [[Defenders (Manhattan) (Earth-616)|Defenders]] [[Luke Cage (Earth-616)|Luke Cage]] and [[Jessica Jones (Earth-616)|Jessica Jones]]), and intercepted The Hand at [[New York City Hall|City Hall]], where the Beast attempted to attack [[Samuel Chung (Earth-616)|Blindspot]]. During that "Battle of City Hall," the combined forces of the superheroes, the Order and the police managed to overpower The Hand. The Beast vanished in a flash of light after Daredevil stabbed it with a magical sword. Having lost many members, Father Jordan intended to go on a recruitment drive, starting with Blindspot.{{r|Daredevil Vol 1 605}}
